Bootstrap Xtra released

Bootstrap Xtra extends Bootstrap Bootstrap is a toolkit from Twitter designed to kickstart development of webapps and sites.

It includes base CSS and HTML for typography, forms, buttons, tables, grids, navigation, and more.

Bootstrap Xtra inludes extra features that are not included in Bootstrap but may be useful for some people.

You can grab it here: http://lightglitch.github.com/bootstrap-xtra/
